ai-kv18.1:1.2_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:1.4_0: Doesn’t you have the Buddha’s instructions, the delightful monastery and go to the country?
ai-kv18.1:1.6_0: The Buddhas have been created by the Enlightened One’s Cetiya at the Enlightenment Tree and the countryside.
ai-kv18.1:1.7_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:2.2_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:2.4_0: Does the Buddha not awakened at the root of the Bodhi tree shrine, the Buddhas awakened for themselves, and was rolled forth the supreme Wheel of Dhamma? Awakened One, he becomes fully extinguished.
ai-kv18.1:2.6_0: If the Buddha was dead and violent, he could be subdued,
ai-kv18.1:2.7_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:3.2_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:3.5_0: “At one time, mendicants, I was staying near Ukkaṭṭhā, in the Subhaga Forest at the root of a magnificent sal tree.”
ai-kv18.1:3.6_0: “Mendicants, at one time, when I was first awakened, I was staying near Uruvelā at the goatherd’s banyan tree.”
ai-kv18.1:3.7_0: “Mendicants, at one time I was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.”
ai-kv18.1:3.8_0: “Mendicants, at one time I was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.”
ai-kv18.1:3.9_0: “Mendicants, one time I was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.”
ai-kv18.1:3.12_0: Therefore the Buddha became a Buddha,
ai-kv18.1:4.1_0: The Buddha will be reborn in the world of men,
ai-kv18.1:4.3_0: Doesn’t you overcome the world? Are you without having mastered the world?
ai-kv18.1:4.5_0: ‘There’s a Buddha in the world who lives, having mastered the world, and does not live having mastered the world, and does not proceed having mastered the world.
ai-kv18.1:4.6_0: “The Buddha is in the world of men, sir.”
ai-kv18.1:4.7_0: The account of the human world is finished.
